text: The Second Seeding pass through the Blue Flame. Those baring the Templar-Axion Seal could eventually pass into Tara and enter incarnations within the sixth races, but the Templar-Axion Seal did not allow them to transmute into their immortal seventh race bodies. The Templar-Axions were destined to repeat innumera- ble incarnational cycles upon Earth in order to clean up the mess they had made by releasing the chaotic forces of D-2. Only the Elohim, the Axious Entity Family and Ra Confederacy families of the Azurites and Amonites, from the Metagalactic Core, or the Breneau Entities from HU-5 had the power to release the Templar-Axion Seal, and would do so only for humans who gained their favor through serving the truth of the Sacred Law of One. The Templar-Axion Seal became as a curse upon the human lineage, as this distortion was passed on genetically; as the Melchizedeks and their Hebrew hybrids interbred with other racial strains, the Templar Seals were passed on, in whole or in part, to incarnate souls who did not have this prior affiliation. Fragments of the Templar Seals that passed on genetically created a variety of incarnational and ascensional problems for anyone involved with them. The Seals were to remain intact for those whose prior affiliations with the Tem- plar Solar Initiates/Templar-Melchizedeks warranted such security measures, but attempts were made to help p
